name: Locust Blast
description:
A new species of locust has evolved a very "explosive" ability. These locusts can detonate for the greater good of the swarm, and they are hungry. Locust Blast is a physics-based puzzle game, the goal of the game is to reach the apple within the designated number of locusts available. If you cannot reach the apple within 4 locusts and the allotted time, it is game over. This game was created in 2 months using C# and the Unity Engine.

Developers Note: Hey guys, this is my first project for college which has taken up 2 months of my life. Feedback and any bugs you may find are greatly appreciated. Thank you.

I will be patching all week.
